Body: The human verification is done also by mavin users in the near geographic location, that means a post from a brasilian influencer is will be processed by brasilian verifiers, that way there is no language problem or different perceptions of images.  The verifier get a anonymous post where he needs to respond to different questions we ask for example: - Is the brand mentioned visible - are there wrong tags or does the image match the keywords - rate the image creativity / quality - is the product visible  depending on the score of the influencer and score of the verifier there are between 5-20 verifiers doing the same job, with different questions, not every verifier will see the same questions.  In the end we will process this informations and score the post quality and also the verification quality  We will inject tests to see if the verifier is just clicking trought or doing is job good. if a verifier is has too much disconsense to others we will reduce his score.  In that way also the verifiers are verified :-)   Every app user can decide if he wants to be influencer, both or just verifier. In all cases he will be rewarded.

Body: The Mavin Platform has two integrated quality verification layers. On one hand, the accuracy of the picture and the sentiment of the comments will be analyzed by our A.I. framework powered by Google and IBM. In addition, verifiers can earn money on the platform without being part of the influencer activities by contributing to the quality verification.
